thread.section_title: Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful hotel and experience
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel and experience - Review of Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Miguel A
title: Beautiful hotel and experience
text:
I came to Paris for vacation to work on a project with a colleague in late February and really liked the time I spent in this hotel. The building is beautiful. Very convenient and close walk to the Metro so you can go anywhere and even then there's plenty of restaurants aroumd there. The decor screams Paris, which I loved!
The staff were all very wonderful, helpful and extremely respectful to all of their guests including us.
Overall a very good experience staying in this hotel, very worth it! I would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting.
